titles.title: Gold Star Families National Monument Extension Act
Gold Star Families National Monument Extension Act
To extend the authority for the establishment of a commemorative work in honor of Gold Star Families, and for other purposes.
Gold Star Families National Monument Extension Act

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Natural Resources.
Referred to the Subcommittee on National Parks, Forests, and Public Lands.

committee.subcommittee: National Parks, Forests, and Public Lands
committee.name: House Natural Resources

bill.summary:
Gold Star Families National Monument Extension Act
This bill extends through January 2, 2027, the authority of the Gold Star Mothers National Monument Foundation to establish a commemorative work in honor of Gold Star families.
